Section.Label: Chapter_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_of_attributes
Section.Heading: ramp automatic generated documentation of attributes

ManSection.Returns: The polytope that is dual to P.
The Petrial (Petrie dual) of P. Note that this is not necessarily a polytope.

Section.Label: Chapter_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_of_properties
Section.Heading: ramp automatic generated documentation of properties

ManSection.Returns: Whether this polytope is isomorphic to its dual.
